skins.name: Skeleton King
skins.description: A Halloween-themed skeletonized king carrying a tombstone sword. Features unique animations where arms fall off while holding sword.
skins.availability: Gold Pass (October 2019 Season) - Later available for 1,500 Gems (October 2020)

skins.name: Gladiator King
skins.description: The standard Gladiator skin for the Barbarian King.

skins.name: Ice Queen
skins.description: A frozen-themed queen with icy effects and animations.

skins.name: Nightmare Prince
skins.description: Dark noir-era styled prince from Cosmic Curse season, swapping playful flair for sharp black-and-white aesthetics.
skins.availability: Cosmic Curse Season special offer (October 5-31, 2024) - Features Meteor Staff Equipment

skins.name: Winter Champion
skins.description: Festive winter-themed champion with snowy effects.

all_decorations.name: Barbarian Statue
all_decorations.description: A proud statue of the classic Barbarian, one of Clash's most iconic troops. Shows your appreciation for the basics.
all_decorations.availability: Permanently available in Shop for Gold

all_decorations.name: Ancient Barbarian Statue
all_decorations.description: A stone statue depicting a fierce barbarian warrior from ancient times.
all_decorations.availability: Permanently available in Shop for Gold

all_decorations.name: Dragon Statue
all_decorations.description: An imposing statue of a dragon. When tapped by visiting players, it breathes fire and roars.
all_decorations.availability: Permanently available in Shop for Gold

all_obstacles.name: Clashmas Tree (2012)
all_obstacles.description: The original Christmas tree from Clash's launch year. Features a unique design different from later years.
all_obstacles.availability: Spawned naturally during Clashmas 2012 - No longer available

all_obstacles.name: Halloween Tombstone
all_obstacles.description: A spooky tombstone with eerie effects and sounds when touched.

all_sceneries.name: Cosmic Scenery
all_sceneries.description: A meteoroid that drifted peacefully across the cosmos until transformed by Eternal Warden into a doom deliverer. Features space and meteor themes.

all_sceneries.name: Dark Days Scenery
all_sceneries.description: Transforms village into a moody black-and-white cityscape with dark alleys and flickering lights. Complete noir film aesthetic.
